H0.text: where is kansas city. Jackson County

H1.text: where is kansas city. Wyandotte County

H2.text: where is kansas city. Clay County

H3.text: where is kansas city. Platte County

A4.text: Kansas City, Missouri, is located on the Missouri River at its confluence with the Kansas River, within Jackson, Clay, Platte and Cass counties.

A5.text: The county seats are Independence and Kansas City, making Jackson County one of 33 U.S. counties with more than one county seat.
